page.title: 13+++ HOUSING 2 ++++
page.content: glossary cont. Terraced House: A dwelling which is joined on to several other houses of the same design. The number of houses differs from area to area but is always more than two. Terraced Houses can have 2,3,4 or more bedrooms depending on their size. Pub. Short for public house.(see page 16) Shop. A place where goods can be purchased. In this survey both the pub and the shop had the living accommodation above the work area. Both dwellings have 4 family bedrooms. In this survey none of the families lived in flats or appartments, although there are a feew of these types of homes in Malpas.
